summary: Build a website similar to https://tokenspot.com/en.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wordmark logo with simple geometric mark, warm dark theme friendly (tokenspot-like modern style but original) (brand-logo.dim_512x160.png)
- Hero illustration: abstract 3D coins/tokens with subtle glow on dark background, original composition (hero-illustration.dim_1400x900.png)
- Set of 6 minimalist feature icons (security, speed, transparency, community, rewards, analytics) in consistent line style (feature-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png)
- Subtle seamless background pattern (abstract grid/particles) suitable for dark sections (bg-pattern.dim_1600x1600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, multi-section marketing website inspired by the layout and interaction patterns of https://tokenspot.com/en, using original content and assets (do not copy text/images from the reference site). Include at minimum: a top navigation bar, a hero section with a clear headline/subheadline and primary CTA button, a features/benefits section, a how-it-works section, a roadmap/timeline section, an FAQ accordion, and a footer with link groups.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a distinct style appropriate for a modern token/product landing page. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly requested.

Add required static generated images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the homepage (e.g., logo in navbar/footer, hero illustration in hero section, feature icons in the features section).
